channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024030366
item.description:
Report X-2024030366

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP ON LOAD SIDE WET DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND 3 OUT OF 3 BOTTLES TO HAVE BROKEN SEALS; SMALL PIN SIZE HOLE, WHICH ALLOWED THE PRODUCT TO LEAK OUT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024030394
item.description:
Report X-2024030394

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered damaged in unload.package was dropped.upon inspection one bottle had a loose cap leaking out 10 oz of content. DescribePack: failure was due to package being dropped resulting in internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill was contained inside outer container.package was placed in haz tote and put under ventilation system.

item.title: Report X-2024030397
item.description:
Report X-2024030397

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: HALETHORPE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: improperly handled. Dropped. Once noticed that contents were leaking, immediately placed into a hazmat waste container and transported o the damage hazmat cage. DescribePack: dropped causing a big crack at the bottom of the drum. contents steadily leaking out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed into salvage drum to contain the spill

item.title: Report X-2024030105
item.description:
Report X-2024030105

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: LANDOVER
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR SPILL. IRREG CHUTE/SLIDE IRREG PACKAGE FELL ONTO THE FLOOR. USING BOOTS, APRON, GOGGLE AND GLOVES) ON AND SPILL CART, RESPONDER WENT TO RESPOND TO THE SPILL. USING DECISION TREE AND RESPONDSE SHEET. RESPONDER USED ZEPZORBENT AND CONTAINERIZED THE SPILL INTO THE SPILL TRAY. RESPONDER TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024030178
item.description:
Report X-2024030178

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered damaged on 600 van line.outer container was wet.upon inspection one glass bottle was punctured on the side near the bottom causing 4 liters of content to leak out. DescribePack: failure was due to package being dropped. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: fold absorb was used to contain spill.package was placed in hazmat tote and put under ventilation system.

item.title: Report E-2024030145
item.description:
Report E-2024030145

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-16
  • City: CUMBERLAND
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PITT OHIO GROUND LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Upon arrival at the destination terminal, this drum was discovered to be leaking on the trailer floor. Investigation released that this drum was punctured by a protruding nail head in the trailer floor. The drum was immediately placed into an overpack to minimize further release. The released material was neutralized and containerized for disposal. Due to the hazard of material, the package specifications were not able to be safely obtained.

  • Description: On 02/19/2023 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL BWI Service Center, 1328 Charwood Rd, Hanover, MD 21076. Transportation by road has been confirmed.
